meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Greg Rombach Helen Atlas Kerry Tymchuk Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1172.

td.p: Greg Rombach, a salesman from Glendale, California
Helen Atlas, a speech pathologist from Orangeburg, New York
Kerry Tymchuk, an attorney originally from Reedsport, Oregon (whose 4-day cash winnings total $30,401)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL SLOGANS
COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
'50s SONGS
SEWING
FICTIONAL DETECTIVES
"C" HERE

the night (or darkness)

Triple Stumper

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_5_4', 'clue_DJ_5_4_stuck', '(Alex: And you\'re in second place, trailing Greg by $1,100 at the moment, and we have about a minute left in the round.)
...
(Helen: Uh...)
(Alex: Hurry.)
(Helen: I would say coloring paper.)
(Alex: No. Correct response--"What is [*] paper?" Into all those wonderful shapes.)

cutting

Helen
')

tr.td: FAMOUS NAMES
The story of this man who rented a house in Omaha, Nebraska in 1917 was made into a 1938 film
Kerry
Helen
Greg
3rd place: a Design Institute America recliner + either the Jeopardy! box game or Jeopardy! scorekeeper
2nd place: a trip to Tampa, Florida via Continental Airlines + either the Jeopardy! box game or Jeopardy! scorekeeper
New champion: $2,700 + either the Jeopardy! box game or Jeopardy! scorekeeper
Kerry
Helen
Greg

(including 1 DD),
